import{v4 as uuid}from'uuid';import{ADD_EXPENSE,REMOVE_EXPENSE,EDIT_EXPENSE}from'../constants/expensesConstants';// ADD_EXPENSE
export var addExpense=function addExpense(){var _ref=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:{},description=_ref.description,amount=_ref.amount,createdAt=_ref.createdAt,_ref$note=_ref.note,note=_ref$note===void 0?'':_ref$note;return{type:ADD_EXPENSE,payload:{id:uuid(),description:description,note:note,amount:amount,createdAt:createdAt}};};// REMOVE_EXPENSE
